keyMoments.title: Final Battle Against Don Accino
keyMoments.description: Luffy confronts Don Accino in the climactic final battle of the Ice Hunter Arc amidst crumbling ice and rising lava.
keyMoments.significance: The decisive battle that determines the outcome of the entire arc.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Luffy defeats Don Accino with an anime-exclusive finishing technique, pushing through the extreme heat burning his hands by declaring his internal fire burns hotter.
keyMoments.significance: An anime-only technique showcasing Luffy's willpower overcoming physical limitations.
keyMoments.quote: My heat is hotter than yours!

keyMoments.title: Net Tire Technique
keyMoments.description: Don Accino uses the Net Tire technique during his battle with Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates additional combat techniques from the Atsu Atsu no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Steam Iron 10,000 Degree Press
keyMoments.description: Don Accino unleashes his maximum power attack, heating his body to 10,000 degrees Celsius.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the peak offensive capability of the Atsu Atsu no Mi Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Defeat by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Don Accino is sent flying by Luffy's Hyakuman-do Bazooka and defeated.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Don Accino's antagonist role and the conclusion of the Ice Hunter Arc.

abilities.description: A heat-based attack utilizing the Atsu Atsu no Mi's powers.
Don Accino's ultimate attack where he heats his body to 10,000 degrees Celsius and delivers a devastating press attack.

keyMoments.title: Phoenix Pirates vs Campacino
keyMoments.description: Puzzle leads the Phoenix Pirates in battle against Campacino and the remaining Accino Family members.
keyMoments.significance: The Phoenix Pirates reclaim their honor by fighting their captors.

keyMoments.title: Promise to Meet in the New World
keyMoments.description: Puzzle promises to meet the Straw Hats again in the New World, vowing to become stronger.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up potential future reunion and emphasizes the New World as the ultimate goal.
keyMoments.quote: We'll meet again in the New World! I promise!

keyMoments.title: Reconciliation with Lil
keyMoments.description: Arbell apologizes to her younger sister Lil for neglecting her after marriage and the two reconcile.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional closure to the sisters' conflict and shows redemption for the Accino Family.
keyMoments.quote: I'm sorry for being a bad sister. I promise to spend more time with you.

relationships.description: Arbell is Lil's older sister. They had a strained relationship due to Arbell's marriage to Salchow, but reconciled in this episode.

evolutionMoments.description: Arbell apologizes to Lil and promises to spend more time with her, healing their relationship.

keyMoments.title: Helps Recover the Stolen Flags
keyMoments.description: Lil convinces a bird-fish creature to help recover the Straw Hats' flag and other stolen pirate flags. Robin comforts her by drying her tears with her Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Lil's aid resolves the central conflict of the Ice Hunter Arc.

keyMoments.title: Reconciliation with Arbell
keyMoments.description: Lil reconciles with her older sister Arbell, dancing together after Arbell apologizes for neglecting her.
keyMoments.significance: Resolves Lil's emotional arc and her feelings of abandonment.

relationships.description: Lil is Arbell's younger sister. She felt neglected when Arbell married Salchow, but they reconciled in this episode.

evolutionMoments.description: Lil accepts Arbell's apology and the sisters dance together, healing their bond.

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Phoenix Pirates
keyMoments.description: Campacino engages in battle with the Phoenix Pirates as they fight to reclaim their honor.
keyMoments.significance: Allows the Phoenix Pirates to settle their score with the Accino Family.

abilities.description: A magnetic ability shared with his twin brother Brindo, allowing them to attract or repel each other. Not a Devil Fruit power but a natural ability.

relationships.description: Campacino is the twin brother of Brindo, and they can perform Combination Play together.

keyMoments.title: Comforts Lil
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Devil Fruit powers to dry Lil's tears, showing compassion to the young Accino Family member.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's caring nature even toward former enemies.
